column2: Aruba was the perfect destination for a little luxury getaway
Aruba was perfection.  Staff was friendly, helpful and most of all fun.  We had such a laugh!
It was a fabulous week, enjoyed it thoroughly.
It was great, my family and I loved it. Made me feel like a home away from home.
I very much enjoyed my stay, the villa was like a second home for me and I would've loved to stay longer. Only criticism is that the towels were dirty and it took hours for the staff to replace them.
